summary: This is a brief administrative notice from the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit regarding a change in case manager for the appeal in the case of Maxwell. It provides no substantive details about the underlying case.

persons.name: Robert A. Katzmann
persons.context: He is listed as the Chief Judge of the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit on this administrative notice.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The notice references the case as 'v. Maxwell', indicating she is a party in the appeal (Docket #16-3945cv).

persons.name: Sweet
persons.context: Listed as the 'DC Judge' for the underlying district court case (15-cv-7433) in the Southern District of New York.

connections.description: Judge Katzmann is the Chief Judge of the appellate court hearing a case involving Maxwell.
Judge Sweet presided over the underlying district court case involving Maxwell.

events.title: Case Manager Change Notice
events.description: The Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit issued a notice that the case manager assigned to the appeal in the case involving Maxwell had been changed.

locations: United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit Thurgood Marshall U.S. Courthouse New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an administrative notice regarding a change in case manager, not a substantive legal filing.
It confirms an active appeal was pending in the Second Circuit in July 2017 under Docket #16-3945cv, with Maxwell as a party.
The underlying district court case was 15-cv-7433, presided over by Judge Sweet in the Southern District of New York.
